name: Serial Killer Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner darkness! This generator crafts chillingly perfect serial killer names. Because everyone needs a good alias... right?
introduction: Ever wondered what your serial killer moniker would be? Delve into the abyss and discover your terrifying alter ego. We're not responsible for any newfound urges to collect stamps... or anything else.
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button. (It's even easier than disposing of evidence!)
Behold your new, sinister identity. (Perfect for late-night brainstorming sessions... or, you know, writing a novel.)
Repeat until you find a name that truly embodies your... *ahem*... artistic vision. (We won't judge... much.)
Use with caution. Side effects may include increased paranoia and a sudden urge to wear black turtlenecks.

faqs.question: Is this generator actually accurate in predicting my future as a serial killer?
faqs.answer: Absolutely not! This is purely for entertainment purposes. If you're having thoughts of harming yourself or others, please seek professional help immediately.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my D&D character?
faqs.answer: Of course! Just be prepared for your party members to be perpetually terrified of you. And maybe invest in some extra dice for 'persuasion' rolls.

faqs.question: Will using this generator put me on a government watchlist?
faqs.answer: Probably not. But if you start buying suspicious amounts of duct tape and zip ties, that's on you. We warned you about the paranoia.

faqs.question: Are the generated names copyrighted?
faqs.answer: No, the names generated are not copyrighted. Feel free to use them as inspiration for your creative endeavors.

faqs.question: Can I suggest new prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: We're always open to suggestions! Send them our way. But please, no descriptions of actual crimes. We're not trying to become accessories after the fact.

faqs.question: What if I don't like the name I get?
faqs.answer: Just hit that generate button again! There are countless terrifying combinations waiting to be unleashed. Keep trying until you find the perfect fit for your... *ahem*... needs.
